title: BBC English Lessons (MP3+Transcripts)
description:
If proper English is what you have been looking for, you've come to the right place:

with this collection of BBC original MP3 lessons plus transcripts you can learn how to:

Complain
Show annoyance
Say sorry
Accept an apology
Point out the positive side of a situation
Get back to the topic
Express likes/dislikes
Agree/disagree
Make a point
Say goodbye
and many more useful sessions which would certainly help you improve your form of speech.

5 hours of sound recording.

Enjoy!
